text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm going to
show you how I make my triple chocolate
cookies they are so amazingly good I
mean who doesn't want a chocolate cookie
and with a little triple chocolate
cookie they are super simple and easy to
make so let's go with the ingredients to
get started you're going to need some
all-purpose flour some granulated sugar
some brown sugar some melted chocolate
some unsweet unsalted butter at room
temperature eggs cocoa powder some
chocolate chips you're going to need
some cinnamon salt baking soda and
vanilla extract now let's get started
first thing you want to is a oven to 350
second thing you want to do is get a
baking sheet or two or three and line
them with some parchment paper get that
ready for you
ovens ready so we're ready to raise
these cookies so I'm going to make these
in my standard sanding mixer which is a

easy as that
so in here I'm going to put in my butter
and it's at room temperature which is
super important I'm going to add in my
sugar both my sugars I should say I'm
going to just turn this on for about a
minute until everything is super nice
and creamy now that's great now this I'm
going to add in my eggs just like so my
melted chocolate that I have let cool
slightly otherwise it will curl the eggs
and we don't want that beautiful and I'm
also going to add in the cocoa powder
now the reason I'm adding it at this

this only going to mix in to what's

everything nice and creamy no lumps of

turn
back down start on low until the cocoa
